snippet: A review uncovered 6,554 such instances, unusual even for an agency plagued by decades of problems.
abstract: Review of Arizona's Child Protective Services Agency has found 6,554 instances of cases of child abuse that were wrongfully shelved before any type of investigation was started; scandal threatens to deal a setback to Gov Jan Brewer's administration and legacy, as she had taken credit for reorganizing the child welfare hotline which received 5,000 of the cases that had been shelved.
lead_paragraph: A review uncovered 6,554 such instances, unusual even for an agency plagued by decades of problems.

headline.main: Thousands of Ignored Child Abuse Allegations Plague Arizona Welfare Agency
headline.print_headline: Thousands of Ignored Abuse Allegations Plague Arizona Welfare Agency
